# Virtual environment
venv/
.venv/  

# Compiled Python files
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyd
*.pyo

# Editor/IDE specific files
.vscode/  
.DS_Store # macOS
Thumbs.db # Windows

# Jupyter Notebook files (for prototyping/analysis)
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Test / Coverage results
.pytest_cache/
.coverage
htmlcov/

# Logs and Data
*.log
*.data
*.out

# Specific to  project, generated files like:
# Plots from matplotlib
*.png
*.jpg
*.jpeg
*.svg
*.pdf


# Simulation results files
*.csv
*.txt
